name.ja: ペーパーマインクラフト オリジナル
name.ru: Оригинальная версия Minecraft в стиле бумажной графики
name.th: ต้นฉบับของเกม Paper Minecraft

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Paper Minecraft Original as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте на Paper Minecraft Original като Chrome разширение - също можете да играете без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Juga a Paper Minecraft Original com a una extensió de Chrome - També pots jugar sense connexió a internet, prova-ho ara!
short.cs: Hrajte hru Paper Minecraft Original jako rozšíření pro Chrome - Můžete také hrát bez internetu, vyzkoušejte nyní!
short.da: Spil Papir Minecraft Original som en Chrome-udvidelse - Kan også spilles uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Spielen Sie Paper Minecraft Original als Chrome-Erweiterung - Sie können es auch ohne Internetverbindung spielen, probieren Sie es…
short.el: Παίξτε το παιχνίδι Paper Minecraft Original ως πρόσθετο Chrome - Μπορείτε επίσης να παίξετε χωρίς σύνδεση στο διαδίκτυο, δοκιμάστε…
short.es: Juega Paper Minecraft Original como una extensión de Chrome - Además, ¡puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora mismo!
short.et: Jouez à Paper Minecraft Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.fi: Pelaa Paper Minecraft Originalia Chrome-laajennuksena - Voit myös pelata ilman internetyhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Paper Minecraft Original bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin Itong I-play nang walang Internet, subukan ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Paper Minecraft Original en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.hi: Speel Paper Minecraft Original as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Jy kan ook sonder internet speel, probeer dit nou!
short.hr: Igrajte Paper Minecraft Original kao Chrome proširenje - Također može se igrati bez interneta, isprobajte odmah!
short.hu: Játssz a Paper Minecraft eredetivel, mint Chrome-bővítmény - Emellett játszhatsz internet nélkül is, próbáld ki most!
short.id,ms: Mainkan Paper Minecraft Original sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga bisa dimainkan tanpa internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Spielen Sie das Original-Papier-Minecraft als Chrome-Erweiterung - Sie können auch ohne Internet spielen. Probieren Sie es jetzt…
short.ja: クロームの拡張機能としてオリジナルの紙製マインクラフトをプレイする - インターネットなしでもプレイができます、今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 원본 페이퍼 마인크래프트 플레이 - 인터넷 없이도 플레이 가능하니 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Paleiskite Paper Minecraft Original kaip "Google Chrome" išplėtimą - Taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlēt Paper Minecraft Original kā Chrome paplašinājumu - Tāpat var spēlēt bez interneta, pamēģini tagad!
short.nl: Speel Paper Minecraft Original als een Chrome-extensie - Je kunt ook spelen zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Juega a Paper Minecraft Original como una extensión de Chrome: ¡También se puede jugar sin Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.pl: Graj w oryginalne Paper Minecraft jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Możesz także grać bez internetu, wypróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Paper Minecraft Original ca o extensie Chrome - Poți juca și fără internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Paper Minecraft Original в виде расширения для Chrome - также можно играть без подключения к Интернету, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sk: Play Paper Minecraft Original as a Chrome extension - Also, you can play without internet, try it now!
short.sl: Igrajte Paper Minecraft Original kot Chrome razširitev - Lahko tudi igrate brez interneta, preizkusite zdaj!
short.sr: Играјте Paper Minecraft Original као Хром проширење - Такође можете играти без интернета, пробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Papper Minecraft Original som en Chrome-tillägg - Kan också spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่นเกม Paper Minecraft แบบเดิมในรูปแบบของ Chrome extension - ยังสามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Juega a Paper Minecraft Original como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora mismo!
short.uk: Играйте в оригинальную версию бумажного Minecraft через расширение Chrome - Также можно играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.vi: Chơi Paper Minecraft gốc như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần internet, thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 在Chrome扩展中玩原版纸质Minecraft-也可以无需网络游戏，现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充功能中遊玩原始紙張 Minecraft - 也可以在沒有網路的情況下遊玩，現在試試看吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌍 Paper Minecraft Original - Unleash Your Creativity!

Dive into the blocky world of Paper Minecraft Original, where creativity knows no bounds. Craft, build, and explore in this pixelated realm that pays homage to the iconic Minecraft universe. Whether you're a seasoned crafter or a novice adventurer, embark on a journey of endless possibilities.

🧱 Limitless Building: Build and shape your world with an extensive array of blocks. From towering structures to intricate landscapes, unleash your imagination and create a unique universe.

⚔️ Survival Adventure: Face the challenges of the pixelated wilderness. Gather resources, craft tools, and survive the night as you navigate through a dynamic world filled with surprises.

🎨 Pixel Art Mastery: Express yourself with pixel-perfect creativity. Design stunning pixel art, construct detailed structures, and customize your surroundings with an extensive palette of vibrant colors.

🌲 Exploration and Discovery: Venture into the unknown, uncover hidden treasures, and explore vast landscapes teeming with secrets. The world of Paper Minecraft Original invites you to discover its wonders.

👾 Monsters and Challenges: Encounter formidable monsters and face thrilling challenges as you traverse the landscape. Your survival instincts and strategic thinking will be put to the test.

🤝 Multiplayer Excitement: Join forces with friends or fellow adventurers in multiplayer mode. Collaborate on grand projects, embark on quests, and share the joy of creating together.

🎮 Easy Controls: Enjoy an intuitive control system that allows for seamless navigation and crafting. Spend less time figuring out controls and more time immersed in the gaming experience.

🌐 Community of Builders: Connect with a vibrant community of builders and gamers. Share your creations, participate in challenges, and draw inspiration from the diverse creations of others.

Embark on an unforgettable journey in the blocky universe of Paper Minecraft Original. Craft, build, and let your creativity run wild in a world where every block tells a story. Are you ready to embark on your pixelated adventure? 🌈✨


Play more games on the top-left menu.
